documentation.subtitle: Aw ye bilasiralikanw ni nafolomafɛnw ɲini walasa k’aw dɛmɛ ka nafa caman sɔrɔ Contentry la. I ka ɲɛjiralan dɔ sugandi min sinsinnen bɛ i jɔyɔrɔ kan.
documentation.backToGuides: Segin ka taa Guides bɛɛ la

whatsNew.title: Mun ye Ko kura ye
whatsNew.description: Kuma kura minnu bɛ sɔrɔ otomatiki la ani fɛn kura minnu farala o plateforme kan
whatsNew.subtitle: Yɛlɛma ni fɛn kura minnu bɛ sɔrɔ plateforme kan, olu bɛ sɔrɔ otomatiki la
whatsNew.feature1: UI minnu bɛ dɔn u yɛrɛma, olu bɛ fɛn caman Changer
whatsNew.feature2: Ɲɛfɔli minnu bɛ sɔrɔ AI fɛ
whatsNew.feature3: Écran ja minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ

adminGuide.title: Guide d'administration (Guide d'administration) ye
adminGuide.description: Gafe dafalen min bɛ kɛ plateforme ɲɛmɔgɔw ye. Aw ye baarakɛlaw ɲɛnabɔcogo dɔn, ka jateminɛw kɔlɔsi, ani ka sistɛmu sigicogo labɛn.

enterpriseGuide.title: Gafe min bɛ wele ko Enterprise Guide
enterpriseGuide.description: Gafe min bɛ ɲɛsin sosiyete ɲɛmɔgɔw ma. Aw ye aw ka kulu ɲɛminɛcogo dege, ka dɔnniyadagayɔrɔw sigi sen kan, ani ka kɔnɔkow sɔnniw ɲɛnabɔ.

userGuide.title: Gafe min bɛ baara kɛ ni a ye
userGuide.description: I mago bɛ fɛn o fɛn na walasa ka kɔnɔkow da, k’u sɛgɛsɛgɛ, k’u bɔ kɛnɛ kan. Dafalen don kɔnɔkow dabɔbagaw ni feerekɛlaw ma.
userGuide.feature3: Profils stratégiques (Sɛbɛnni minnu bɛ kɛ ni fɛɛrɛ ye).

overview.intro: I n’a fɔ plateforme ɲɛmɔgɔ, i bɛ se ka baarakɛminɛn caman sɔrɔ walasa ka Contentry plateforme bɛɛ kɔlɔsi ani k’a ɲɛnabɔ. Nin gafe in bɛna aw dɛmɛ ka aw ka marako sekow faamu.
overview.dashboardDesc: Admin Dashboard bɛ kɔnɔnin ɲɛ ye plateforme baara ni kɛnɛya kan.
overview.feature1: Baarakɛlaw ka baara kɔlɔsili waati yɛrɛ la
overview.feature4: Ka se teliya la ka se ka mara baara nafamaw sɔrɔ
overview.tip: Aw bɛ taa Admin Dashboard la tuma bɛɛ walasa ka kunnafoni sɔrɔ plateformew taabolo kan ani ka ko minnu bɛ se ka kɛ, aw k’olu dɔn joona.

userManagement.intro: Baarakɛlaw ɲɛnabɔli ye marako baara koloma ye min b’a to i bɛ se ka baarakɛlaw ni baarakɛda bɛɛ kɔlɔsi plateforme kan.
userManagement.viewUsersDesc: Aw ye don Baarakɛlaw ɲɛnabɔli yɔrɔ la walasa ka plateforme baarakɛlaw bɛɛ lajɛ, k’u ɲini ani k’u ɲɛminɛ.
userManagement.feature1: Baarakɛlaw ɲini ani k’u filɛ u tɔgɔ, imɛri walima u jɔyɔrɔ fɛ
userManagement.feature2: Baarakɛlaw ka kunnafoniw ni baara tariku ɲɛfɔlenw lajɛ
userManagement.feature3: Baarakɛlaw jɔyɔrɔw ni u ka yamaruyaw sɛmɛntiya
userManagement.feature4: Baarakɛlaw ka jatew dabila walima k’u bɔ yen ni a mago bɛ a la
userManagement.rolesDesc: Kɔrɔɲɔgɔnmaya jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ saba bɛ yen:
userManagement.role1: Admin: Plateforme dafalen sɔrɔli ni sistɛmu labɛnni sekow ye
userManagement.role2: Enterprise Admin: A bɛ u ka sosiyete ka kulu ni a ka sigidakow ɲɛnabɔ
userManagement.role3: Baarakɛla: Kɔnɔkow dabɔli ni sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛcogo jɔnjɔnw
userManagement.warning: Aw bɛ a nɔfɛkow sɛgɛsɛgɛ tuma bɛɛ sani aw ka baarakɛlaw jɔyɔrɔ Changer walima ka jatew bɔ yen. O walew bɛ se ka nɔ bila jɛkulu ka baarakɛcogo la.

analytics.intro: Sɛgɛsɛgɛliw bɛ hakilina juguw di baara kɛcogo kan ni o yɔrɔ in ye baarakɛda ni baarakɛlaw bɛɛ kɔnɔ.
analytics.metric1: Baarakɛlaw bɛɛ lajɛlen minnu bɛ baara kɛ ani yiriwali taabolo
analytics.metric2: Kɔnɔkow dabɔli ni u sɛgɛsɛgɛli hakɛ
analytics.metric5: Laadalata ni farati hakɛw baarakɛda bɛɛ kɔnɔ
analytics.tip: Sɛgɛsɛgɛli rapɔɔriw bila ka taa jamana wɛrɛw la walasa ka ɲɛsin ɲɛmɔgɔw ka jirali ma ni Télécharger Rapport fɛɛrɛ ye.

financials.intro: Nafolo lajɛ yɔrɔ bɛ yecogo di plateforme sɔrɔta ni abonnés jateminɛw kɔnɔ.
financials.revenueDesc: Nafolo kɛnɛyako ni abonnés (abonnenw) cogoyaw kɔlɔsi baarakɛda bɛɛ kɔnɔ.
financials.feature1: Kalo o kalo sɔrɔ segin-segin (MRR) nɔfɛtaama

systemConfig.intro: Sistɛmu labɛncogo b’a to i bɛ se ka plateforme bɛɛ ka settings ni integrations ɲɛnabɔ.
systemConfig.integrationsDesc: Mɔgɔ sabananw ka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw labɛn ani k’u kɔlɔsi:
systemConfig.integration1: Ayrshare API ka ɲɛsin sosiyete ka kunnafonidilanw bɔli ma
systemConfig.integration2: AI baarakɛminɛnw kɔnɔkow labɛnni ni u sɛgɛsɛgɛli kama
systemConfig.tip: Aw bɛ integrations kɔrɔbɔ tuma bɛɛ staging sigida la sani aw ka fɛn dɔw Changer ka ɲɛsin production settings ma.

gettingStarted.intro: Aw ni ce Contentry la! I n’a fɔ Baarakɛda ɲɛmɔgɔ, baarakɛminɛnw b’i bolo walasa k’i ka jɛkulu ɲɛminɛ, ka kɔnɔkow laadilikanw sigi senkan, ani ka taamasiyɛnw kɛcogo kelen sabati.
gettingStarted.setupDesc: Aw ye nin fɛɛrɛ ninnu labato walasa k’aw ka baarakɛyɔrɔ jatebɔsɛbɛn sigi sen kan:
gettingStarted.step1: I ka taa Settings > Enterprise yɔrɔ la walasa ka don i ka sosiyete ka dashboard kɔnɔ
gettingStarted.step2: Aw ye aw ka sosiyete ka taamasiyɛnw ni a ka sariyaw bila Dɔnniya yɔrɔ la
gettingStarted.step3: Aw ye aw ka kulu kɔnɔmɔgɔw wele ani ka jɔyɔrɔ bɛnnenw di u ma
gettingStarted.step4: I ka sɔnni baarakɛcogo labɛn walasa ka kɔnɔkow lajɛ
gettingStarted.tip: Aw ye aw ka Dɔnniya Jɛkulu sigicogo dafa sani aw ka jɛkulu kɔnɔmɔgɔw wele walasa u ka se ka taamasiyɛnw sɔrɔ kabini tile fɔlɔ.

teamManagement.intro: Ekipu ɲɛnabɔli ɲuman bɛ jɛkafɔ ɲuman ni dondaw kɔlɔsili ɲuman sabati i ka jɛkulu kɔnɔ.
teamManagement.inviteDesc: Aw ye mɔgɔ kuraw fara aw ka baarakɛjɛkulu kan:
teamManagement.feature1: Ekipu mɔgɔ ka e-mail ladɛrɛsi sɛbɛn
teamManagement.feature2: U jɔyɔrɔ sugandi (Dabɔbaga, ɲɛmɔgɔ, walima ɲɛmɔgɔ) .
teamManagement.feature3: I yɛrɛ ka cikan dɔ fara welesɛbɛn kan min bɛ se ka kɛ i yɛrɛ sago ye
teamManagement.rolesDesc: Aw bɛ jɔyɔrɔw di ka da kunkanbaaraw kan:
teamManagement.role1: Dabaga: A bɛ se ka kɔnɔkow da ani k’u ci walasa u ka sɔn u ma
teamManagement.role2: Kunnafonidila: A bɛ se ka kɔnɔkow sɔn/ban ani ka dabɔbagaw ɲɛnabɔ
teamManagement.role3: Admin: Baarakɛda dafalen sɔrɔli ka fara fatura ni settings kan
teamManagement.tip: Welesɛbɛnw bɛ ban tile 7 kɔfɛ. Ekipu kɔnɔmɔgɔw hakili jigin u ka sɔn u ka weleli ma joona.

knowledgeBase.intro: Dɔnniya-yɔrɔ ye i ka sosiyete ka cɛmancɛ marayɔrɔ ye min bɛ fɛnw maracogo laadilikanw, sariyaw ani kɔnɔkow sariyaw jira. Sɛbɛn minnu bɛ bila yan, olu bɛ kunnafoni di AI ka kunnafoniw di jɛkulu kɔnɔmɔgɔw bɛɛ ma.
knowledgeBase.uploadDesc: Sɛbɛnw fara a kan minnu bɛna kɔnɔkow dabɔli ɲɛminɛ:
knowledgeBase.docType1: Marka cogoya ɲɛjiralanw ani kumakan ɲɛminɛcogo
knowledgeBase.docType4: Sariya minnu bɛ kɛ izini kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw kan
knowledgeBase.tip: Aw ye aw ka taamasiyɛnw bilasiralikan nafamabaw bila fɔlɔ. AI bɛ sɛbɛnw bila jɔyɔrɔ fɔlɔ la sosiyete ka Dɔnniyaso kɔnɔ ka tɛmɛ baarakɛla kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka fɛnw bilali kan.

approvalWorkflow.intro: Sɔn baarakɛcogo b’a to kɔnɔkow bɛɛ bɛ bɛn i ka sosiyete ka sariyaw ma sani u ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan.
approvalWorkflow.processDesc: Kɔnɔkow bɛ woyo ka tɛmɛ nin taabolo ninnu fɛ:
approvalWorkflow.step1: Dabaga bɛ kɔnɔkow lawuli walima k’u sɛgɛsɛgɛ
approvalWorkflow.step2: Kɔnɔkow bɛ ci walasa ka sɔn (ni a mago bɛ a la) .
approvalWorkflow.step3: Kunnafonidila bɛ segin a kan ani ka hakilinaw di
approvalWorkflow.step4: Kɔnɔkow minnu dabɔra, olu bɛ se ka bɔ sosiyete ka kunnafonidilanw kan
approvalWorkflow.warning: A’ ye sɔnni wajibiyalenw kɛ Settings kɔnɔ walasa ka a lajɛ ni kɔnɔkow bɛɛ lajɛra sani u ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan.

billing.intro: I ka baarakɛyɔrɔ abonné ɲɛnabɔ ani ka juru baaracogo kɔlɔsi.
billing.subscriptionDesc: Aw ka fatura dashboard bɛ ninnu di:
billing.feature1: Sisan bolodacogo ɲɛfɔli ani juru tilacogo

adminUsersPage.title: Baarakɛlaw ka ɲɛnabɔli
adminUsersPage.subtitle: Plateforme-wide baarakɛlaw ɲɛnabɔ
adminUsersPage.searchPlaceholder: Ɲini ni email walima tɔgɔ ye...

actions.impersonate: Aw ye aw yɛrɛ kɛ aw yɛrɛ ye

toasts.loadFailed: A ma se ka baarakɛlaw doni
toasts.deleteFailed: A ma se ka baarakɛla bɔ yen
toasts.updateFailed: A ma se ka baarakɛla kura ye

adminUsersPage.confirmDelete: Yala i dalen b’a la ko i b’a fɛ ka nin baarakɛla in bɔ yen wa?
adminUsersPage.deleteWarning: O wale in tɛ se ka kɔsegin.

deleteModal.title: Baarakɛla min bɛ wele ko Delete
deleteModal.description: O bɛna baarakɛla ni a ni ɲɔgɔn cɛ kunnafoniw bɛɛ bɔ yen kudayi:
deleteModal.irreversible: O wale in tɛ se ka kɔsegin.
deleteModal.confirmDelete: Baarakɛla min bɛ wele ko Delete

sections.strategicProfiles: Profils stratégiques (Sɛbɛnni minnu bɛ kɛ ni fɛɛrɛ ye).

gettingStarted.intro: Aw ni ce Contentry la! Nin gafe in bɛna aw dɛmɛ ka kunnafoniw dilan minnu bɛ mɔgɔ bila ka miiri, minnu bɛ bɛn sariya ma, ni baarakɛminɛnw ye minnu bɛ baara kɛ ni AI ye.
gettingStarted.firstStepsDesc: Aw ye a daminɛ ni Contentry ye:
gettingStarted.step1: I ka i ka profil sigi ni kunnafoni lakikaw ye
gettingStarted.step2: Aw ye aw ka sosiyete ka kunnafonidilanw siri ɲɔgɔn na
gettingStarted.step3: Aw ye Profil Stratégique dɔ dilan aw ka marka walima aw ka kanpaɲi kama
gettingStarted.step4: Aw ye aw ka kɔnɔko fɔlɔw labɛn
gettingStarted.tip: A daminɛ ni Profil Stratégique ye walasa i ka kɔnɔkow bɛɛ ka tonkan ni cikanw mara minnu bɛ bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma.

contentCreation.intro: Contentry ka AI-powered content generation b’i dɛmɛ ka poste engaging dilan segin kɔnɔ.
contentCreation.feature1: I b’a fɛ ka fɛn min bila, i ka barokun walima ɲininkali dɔ sɛbɛn min bɛ o ɲɛfɔ
contentCreation.feature2: Aw ye aw ka laɲiniw sugandi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, wdfl) .
contentCreation.feature3: I ka sɛbɛnnikɛcogo min ka di i ye, o sugandi
contentCreation.feature4: Ni i b’a fɛ ka ja dɔ labɛn min bɛ a kɔfɛ
contentCreation.schedulingDesc: Aw ye aw ka kɔnɔkow kalandriya labɛn:
contentCreation.schedule1: Kɔnɔkow bɔli waatibolodalenw sigi sen kan minnu bɛ segin-ka-bɔ
contentCreation.schedule2: Don kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ni waati kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw sugandi walasa ka otomatiki bilali kɛ
contentCreation.schedule3: Aw bɛ se ka auto-posting walima manual review kɛ sani aw ka gafe bɔ
contentCreation.tip: Baara kɛ ni ‘Promotional Content’ yɔrɔ ye n’i bɛ feerelikɛyɔrɔw da walasa ka a jira ko sariya labatoli sɛgɛsɛgɛli bɛ laseli laadilikanw jateminɛ.

analyzeContent.intro: Analyse Content (Kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛ) fɛɛrɛ bɛ i ka kɔnɔkow lajɛ walasa u ka sariya labatoli, u ka laadalakow jateminɛ, ani u ka taamasiyɛnw bɛ bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma.
analyzeContent.howToDesc: Kɔnɔkow bila ka taa sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ:
analyzeContent.step1: Aw bɛ taa yɔrɔ la min tɔgɔ ye ko Content Moderation > Analyse Content (Kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛli).
analyzeContent.step2: I ka kɔnɔkow nɔrɔ sɛbɛnni yɔrɔ la
analyzeContent.step3: Profil Stratégique dɔ sugandi ka ɲɛsin kɔnɔkow ma
analyzeContent.step4: Analyse (Sɛgɛsɛgɛli) digi walasa ka hakilina caman sɔrɔ
analyzeContent.type1: Sosiyete ka sariyaw ni laadilikanw labatoli
analyzeContent.type4: Farati minnu bɛ se ka sɔrɔ ani ladilikanw
analyzeContent.tip: Aw ye kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛ tuma bɛɛ sani aw ka u bɔ kɛnɛma yɔrɔw la, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la kanpaɲiw kama minnu bɛ mara caman laɲini.

strategicProfiles.intro: Profils stratégiques bɛ sigida, kumakan ani bilasiralikanw ɲɛfɔ kɔnɔkow dabɔli n’u sɛgɛsɛgɛli kama.
strategicProfiles.createDesc: Aw ye Profil Stratégique dɔ sigi sen kan:
strategicProfiles.feature1: Profil ka laɲinibagaw ni a kuntilenna ɲɛfɔ
strategicProfiles.feature2: Aw ye laadalakow ni marabolow jateminɛw sigi sen kan
strategicProfiles.feature3: Sɛbɛnw ni laadilikanw minnu ɲɛsinnen bɛ i ka profil kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ma, olu bila
strategicProfiles.feature4: Ton ni style préférences defaults labɛn
strategicProfiles.tip: Aw ye Stratégique Profiles danfaralenw dilan kanpaɲiw, markaw, walima mara suguya suguya wɛrɛw kama.

socialAccounts.intro: Aw ye aw ka sosiyete ka kunnafonidilanw siri ɲɔgɔn na walasa ka kunnafoniw bɔ Contentry fɛ k’a ɲɛsin u yɛrɛ ma.
socialAccounts.connectDesc: Plateforme minnu bɛ dɛmɛ sɔrɔ olu ye:
socialAccounts.platform1: LinkedIn - Mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ni Sosiyete ɲɛw
socialAccounts.warning: Aw ye aw ka sosiyete ka jatebɔsɛbɛnw ɲɔgɔndanw to waati la. Token minnu waati tɛmɛna, olu bɛ se ka sɛbɛnni bolodalenw bali ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan.

approvalProcess.intro: Ni i ka baarakɛyɔrɔ ka sɔnni baarakɛcogo dɔw dabɔra, kɔnɔkow ka kan ka lajɛ sani u ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan.
approvalProcess.submitTitle: Ka fɛnw ci walasa ka sɔnni kɛ
approvalProcess.step1: I ka kɔnɔkow dabɔ walima k’u sɛgɛsɛgɛ
approvalProcess.step2: ‘Submit for Approval’ digi walasa ka ci i ka ɲɛmɔgɔ ma
approvalProcess.step3: Track sɔnni cogoya la Pending Approval layini kɔnɔ
approvalProcess.tip: Aw bɛ sɛbɛnniw fara a kan ni aw bɛ kɔnɔkow ci walasa ka ɲɛfɔli kɛ seginnkannikɛlaw kan aw ka daɲɛw labɛnni latigɛw kan.

aboutGuide.title: About & Fɛɛrɛ ɲumanw
aboutGuide.description: Contentry ye min ye, i k’o dɔn ani ka fɛɛrɛ ɲumanw sɔrɔ walasa k’i ka kɔnɔkow dabɔli, i ka markala bɛnkanw, ani influencer profiles ɲɛ.
aboutGuide.feature2: Ladilikanw minnu bɛ kɛ ka kɔnɔkow ɲɛnabɔ

sections.optimizeContent: I ka kɔnɔkow ɲɛnabɔ ka ɲɛ

whatIsContentry.intro: Contentry ye AI-powered content intelligence platform ye min dabɔra walasa ka kunnafoni dilanbagaw, sugukɛlaw ani baarakɛda dɛmɛ ka kunnafoniw dilan, k’u sɛgɛsɛgɛ, k’u bɔ minnu bɛ bɛn sariya ma, ka kɛɲɛ ni hakɛ ye. I kɛra mɔgɔ kelen-kelen ye min bɛ nɔ bila mɔgɔw la wo, walima i kɛra jagokɛjɛkuluba dɔ kɔnɔmɔgɔ ye wo, Contentry b’i ka kɔnɔkow baarakɛcogo ɲɛ.
whatIsContentry.missionDesc: An dalen b’a la ka fanga di dabɔbagaw ma ni baarakɛminɛn hakilitigiw ye minnu b’a to kunnafoni kelen-kelen bɛɛ ka kɛ fɛntigi ye, min bɛ tali kɛ laadalakow la, ani min bɛ bɛn plateforme laadilikanw ma.
whatIsContentry.benefit1: AI-powered content generation min bɛ bɛn i ka marka kan ma
whatIsContentry.benefit2: Sariya labatoli sɛgɛsɛgɛli waati yɛrɛ la sariyaw wajibiyalenw kan
whatIsContentry.benefit4: Sɔn-ni-sɔn gafeninw ka baarakɛcogo ɲɛnabɔlen don baarakɛda jɛkuluw ye
whatIsContentry.tip: Kɛlɛ bɛ AI fanga ni hadamadenw ka kɔlɔsili fara ɲɔgɔn kan walasa ka kunnafoniw di minnu bɛ i lamɛnbagaw mankan bɔ k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ to ka sariya labato.

keyFeatures.intro: Contentry bɛ baarakɛminɛn caman di walasa k’i ka kɔnɔkow ɲɛnamaya bɛɛ ɲɛnabɔ:
keyFeatures.aiContentDesc: Aw ye kunnafoni ɲumanw dilan minnu bɛ bɛn aw ka taamasiyɛn ni aw lamɛnbagaw ma:
keyFeatures.aiFeature1: Kɔnɔkow bɔli kɛnɛ caman kan (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
keyFeatures.aiFeature2: Sɛbɛnni tonw minnu bɛ se ka ladilan (Professionnel, Casual, Inspirational)
keyFeatures.aiFeature3: AI ja bɔli ka fara aw ka sɛbɛnw kan
keyFeatures.complianceDesc: Aw ye aw jija aw ka kunnafoniw bɛ sariyaw bɛɛ dafa sani aw ka bɔ:
keyFeatures.complianceFeature1: Otomatiki sariya labatoli sɛgɛsɛgɛli ka kɛɲɛ ni sosiyete ka sariyaw ye
keyFeatures.complianceFeature2: Ladamuni sɛgɛsɛgɛli jatebɔ diɲɛ lamɛnnikɛlaw ye
keyFeatures.complianceFeature3: Faratiw jateminɛni ni ladilikanw ye minnu bɛ se ka waleya
keyFeatures.tip: Baara kɛ ni Strategic Profiles ye walasa ka a jira ko brand kan bɛ bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma kɔnɔkow bɛɛ kɔnɔ minnu dilannen don.

bestPractices.intro: Ni aw ye nin wale ɲumanw labato, o bɛna aw dɛmɛ ka nafa caman sɔrɔ Contentry la ani ka kɔnɔkow dilan minnu bɛ baara kɛ ka ɲɛ:
bestPractices.workflowTitle: Kɔnɔkow baarakɛcogo dɔ sigi sen kan
bestPractices.workflowDesc: Baara kɛcogo basigilen bɛ jogo ɲuman ni baarakɛcogo ɲuman sabati:
bestPractices.workflow1: A daminɛ ni i ka Profil Stratégique sigili ye ni marka laadilikanw ye
bestPractices.workflow2: Kɔnɔkow labɛn ni plateforme kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ni lamɛnnikɛlaw hakili la
bestPractices.workflow3: Aw ye kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛ tuma bɛɛ sani aw ka u bɔ kɛnɛma yɔrɔw la
bestPractices.workflow4: Baara kɛ ni waatibolodacogo fɛɛrɛw ye walasa ka posting cadence basigilen mara
bestPractices.consistencyDesc: Marka kɛli tuma bɛɛ bɛ dannaya ni dɔnniya sabati:
bestPractices.consistency1: Aw bɛ aw ka marka cogoya gafe bila Dɔnniya yɔrɔ la
bestPractices.consistency2: Baara kɛ ni o Profil Stratégique kelen ye kanpaɲiw kama minnu bɛ tali kɛ o la
bestPractices.consistency3: AI ye kunnafoni minnu dilan, olu lajɛ walasa k’a dɔn n’u bɛ bɛn i kan ma
bestPractices.warning: Aw bɛ AI ka kunnafoniw lajɛ tuma bɛɛ sani aw ka u bɔ. Hali n’an ka AI fanga ka bon, hadamadenw ka kɔlɔsili bɛ kɛ sababu ye ka nɔ ɲumanw sɔrɔ.

optimizeContent.intro: Kɔnɔkow belebelebaw dabɔli ye daminɛ dɔrɔn de ye. Nin ye cogo ye min bɛ se ka kɛ ka ɲɛ walasa ka se ka baara kɛ kosɛbɛ:
optimizeContent.platformDesc: Plateforme kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ ni wajibi kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw ye ani lamɛnnikɛlaw ka jigiyaw:
optimizeContent.platform1: LinkedIn: I sinsin baarakɛlaw ka hakilinaw kan, ka baara kɛ ni izini daɲɛ kolomaw ye, sɛbɛn jan bɛ sɔn
optimizeContent.platform2: Twitter/X: Cikan surunw, ka baara kɛ ni hashtags ye fɛɛrɛ ɲuman na, ka i sen don barokunw na minnu bɛ taa ɲɛ
optimizeContent.platform3: Facebook : Fɛn yetaw bɛ baara kɛ ka ɲɛ, ka dusu don sigidamɔgɔw kɔnɔ u ka se ka u sen don a la
optimizeContent.platform4: Instagram: Ja minnu ka ɲi kosɛbɛ, olu nafa ka bon, baara kɛ ni hashtag ye min bɛ tali kɛ o la, Stories for engagement
optimizeContent.engagement1: I ka poste kɛ tuma bɛɛ waati ɲumanw na i lamɛnbagaw ye
optimizeContent.engagement2: Baara kɛ ni welekanw ye minnu bɛ mɔgɔ bila ka wale kɛ i ka kɔnɔkow kɔnɔ
optimizeContent.engagement3: Aw ye jaabi di kuma fɔlenw ma ani ka aw sen don aw ka sigida la
optimizeContent.engagement4: Sɛgɛsɛgɛliw nɔfɛtaama walasa k’a faamu kɔnɔko minnu bɛ baara kɛ ka ɲɛ
optimizeContent.tip: Baara kɛ ni Contentry ka waati bolodacogo fɛɛrɛ ye walasa ka kunnafoni bila waati ɲumanw na k’a sɔrɔ i ma i bolo cɛsiri.

brandDeals.intro: Marka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw bɛ se ka kɛ sɔrɔba ye. Aw bɛ se ka aw ka fɛɛrɛ tigɛcogo ɲuman filɛ nin ye:
brandDeals.preparationTitle: Labɛnni ka ɲɛsin Marka jɛɲɔgɔnyaw ma
brandDeals.preparationDesc: Aw ye aw labɛn ni cogoyaw sɔrɔla:
brandDeals.prep1: Aw ye kunnafonisɛbɛn dɔ mara min bɛ baara kɛ ni baarakɛlaw ye, min bɛ bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma
brandDeals.prep2: Aw ye aw ka jɛɲɔgɔnya jateminɛw lajɛ ani k’u jira
brandDeals.prep3: Aw ye kunnafonidilan dɔ jɔ ni aw ka jamanaden hakɛ ye ani ka se
brandDeals.prep4: Baara kɛ ni Contentry ye walasa ka misali taamasiyɛnw kɔnɔkow hakilinaw lawuli
brandDeals.pitchingDesc: Aw ye aw ka fɔlisenw kɛ ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan:
brandDeals.pitch1: I ka kuma fɔcogo bɛn ni marka nafaw ye ani mɔgɔ laɲinitaw ye
brandDeals.pitch2: Aw bɛ kɔnɔkow hakilina kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw di sanni ka hakilinaw di minnu bɛ kɛ fɛn bɛɛ ye
brandDeals.pitch3: Aw ye sariya labatoli sɛgɛsɛgɛli don a kɔnɔ walasa k’a jira ko aw ka kɔnɔkow bɛ laadilikanw dafa
brandDeals.tip: Baara kɛ ni Contentry ka sariya labatoli sɛgɛsɛgɛli ye ni i bɛ kunnafoniw dilan minnu bɛ dɛmɛ sɔrɔ walasa ka FTC ni plateforme jiracogo wajibiyalenw dafa.

influencerProfiles.intro: I ka Stratégique Profile ye i ka kɔnɔkow fɛɛrɛ jusigilan ye. A kɛcogo ɲuman filɛ nin ye:
influencerProfiles.setupTitle: Ka i ka Profil (Profil) sigi sen kan
influencerProfiles.setupDesc: Profil min labɛnna ka ɲɛ, o bɛ a to kunnafoniw bɛ bɛn ɲɔgɔn ma, minnu bɛ sɔrɔ marka kan:
influencerProfiles.setup1: I ka nisɛ ni laɲinibagaw ɲɛfɔ ka jɛya
influencerProfiles.setup2: I ka sɛbɛnni kɛcogo ni i ka sɛbɛnni kɛcogo min ka di i ye, o sigi
influencerProfiles.setup3: Aw ye laadalakow ni marabolow jateminɛw fara aw lamɛnbagaw kan
influencerProfiles.setup4: Sɛbɛn minnu bɛ i ka marka kan ɲɛfɔ, olu bila
influencerProfiles.optimizeDesc: Aw bɛ to ka aw ka kunnafoniw ɲɛ ka taa a fɛ walasa ka nɔ ɲumanw sɔrɔ:
influencerProfiles.optimize1: Aw ye kɔnɔkow lajɛ minnu dilannen don ani ka profil sigicogo ladilan i n’a fɔ a mago bɛ cogo min na
influencerProfiles.optimize2: Aw ye profil caman dilan kanpaɲiw walima lamɛnnikɛlaw danfaralenw kama
influencerProfiles.optimize3: Aw ye aw ka Dɔnniya Baarakɛyɔrɔ kura to ni taamasiyɛn kura ye
influencerProfiles.tip: Aw ye aw ka Profil Stratégique lajɛ kalo saba o kalo saba walasa k’a dɔn ko a bɛ aw ka taamasiyɛn ni aw lamɛnbagaw jira minnu bɛ ka wuli.

workflowsGuide.title: Baarakɛcogo & Jatebɔ gafe
workflowsGuide.description: Aw ye jatebɔ kɛcogo dɔn ani ka baarakɛcogo taabolo kelen-kelen bɛɛ faamuya k’a ta kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛli la ka se sɔnni ma.

scoring.intro: Jatebɔ sira min bɛ Contentry kɔnɔ, o bɛ jatebɔ jɛlen di, min sinsinnen bɛ jalakiw kan, walasa k’i dɛmɛ k’a faamu i ka kɔnɔkow bɛ baara kɛ cogo min na. Jatedenw bɛɛ bɛ daminɛ 100 na, wa jatedenw bɛ bɔ sariya tiɲɛni kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw na walima ko minnu sɔrɔla.
scoring.overallScoreDesc: Jateden bɛɛ lajɛlen ye sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛcogo bɛɛ lajɛlen girinyalen ye, min bɛ daminɛ 0 la ka se 100 ma:
scoring.scoreRange1: 80-100: A ka ɲi kosɛbɛ - A labɛnnen don ka bɔ, kɔnɔkow bɛ ɲɛ kosɛbɛ
scoring.scoreRange2: 60-79: Koɲuman - Fɛɛrɛ misɛnninw ka kan ka kɛ sani u ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan
scoring.scoreRange3: 40-59: Needs Attention - Seginkanni ni seginnkanniw ka kan
scoring.scoreRange4: 0-39: Flagged - Ko nafamaw, aw kana bɔ fo n’u ɲɛnabɔra
scoring.overallCalcDesc: Jateden bɛɛ lajɛlen bɛ baara kɛ ni girinya ye min bɛ se ka ladamu ka da farati hakɛ kan:
scoring.overallCalc4: Faratiba (Labatoli ≤40): Jateden bɛɛ lajɛlen hard-capped at 40 maximum
scoring.componentsDesc: I ka jateden bɛɛ lajɛlen bɛ jate ka bɔ yɔrɔ koloma saba la ni penaliti basigilen ye:
scoring.component1: Sariya labatoli jate: A bɛ daminɛ 100 na, a bɛ jate bɔ sariya tiɲɛni kelen-kelen bɛɛ la min sɔrɔla
scoring.component2: Ladamuni sɛgɛsɛgɛli jate : Hofstede ka laadalakow 6 hakɛ cɛmancɛ
scoring.component3: Tiɲɛni jate: A bɛ daminɛ ni 100 ye, a bɛ jate minɛ tiɲɛbaliya walima ko dɔ la min sɔrɔla
scoring.complianceDetailTitle: Sariya labatoli jate (Jalaki min sinsinnen bɛ jalaki kan) .
scoring.complianceDetailDesc: Poste kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ daminɛ ni Compliance Score ye min ye 100. Points bɛ bɔ sariya tiɲɛni kelen-kelen bɛɛ la:
scoring.complianceSeverity1: Critical Violation (-60 pts): NDA tiɲɛni, gundo kunnafoniw bɔli → Farati min bɛ a dabila teliya la
scoring.complianceSeverity2: Dankarili jugu (-40 pts): Tɔrɔ, danfara, koniya kuma → Sariya wale farati
scoring.complianceSeverity3: Sariya tiɲɛniba (-25 pts): Piblisite jirali tununen, sariya tiɲɛni → Alamanw/jɔli farati
scoring.complianceSeverity4: Dankarili danmadɔ (-10 pts): Ton bɛnbali, bilasiralikanw jiginni misɛnnin → Degeli/lasɔmini
scoring.complianceSeverity5: Misali: #ad (-25) tununen + Tone issue (-10) = Jate laban ye 65 ye
scoring.complianceAdjustment: Dankarili caman stack - jalaki kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ waleya ɲɔgɔn fɛ
scoring.complianceViolationTypes: Dankarili minnu sɛgɛsɛgɛra: Gundo kunnafoniw, Tɔgɔtɔgɔnin, NDA tiɲɛni, Fɔli tununnen, Politiki tiɲɛni, Ton bɛnbali
scoring.culturalDetailDesc: Ladamuni jate ye Hofstede ka laadalakow hakɛ ofisiyali wɔɔrɔ cɛmancɛ ye (0-100 kelen-kelen bɛɛ):
scoring.culturalDim1: Fanga yɔrɔjan: Formality, bonya bonya fanga kan vs egalitarian, casual tone
scoring.culturalDim2: Mɔgɔ kelen-kelen bɛɛ ni jɛkulu ka ɲɛtaa : ‘Ne/Ne’ sinsinnan ni ‘Anw/Anw’ sigida sinsinnan
scoring.culturalDim3: Cɛya ni musoya: Sɔrɔdasi/assertif vs cooperative/consensus kan
scoring.culturalDim4: Daŋaniyabaliya Kɔrɔbɔli: Sariyaw, lakana, sinsinni jɛlen ni da wulilen ye daɲɛ fila-fila la
scoring.culturalDim5: Kunnafoni kuntaalajan : Sara nataw sinsincogo ni tɔnɔ kuntaala surunw
scoring.culturalDim6: Indulgence vs. Restraint: Jigiya/diyabɔli ni kan min bɛ mara/kan min bɛ kɔrɔsi
scoring.culturalRisk: Ni Cultural Score jigira ka tɛmɛ 50 kan, ‘Reputation Risk’ girinya bɛ kɛ walasa k’i ka taamasiyɛn lakana diɲɛ lamɛnbagaw cɛma
scoring.accuracyDetailTitle: Tiɲɛni jate (Jalaki min sinsinnen bɛ penaliti kan) .
scoring.accuracyDetailDesc: Poste bɛɛ bɛ daminɛ ni Accuracy Score ye min ye 100. Points bɛ bɔ issues sɔrɔlenw na:
scoring.accuracyCheck1: Tiɲɛbaliya/Kunnafoni juguba (-40 pts): Nkalon fɔlenw, kunnafoniw dilannenw
scoring.accuracyCheck2: Soso min tɛ se ka da a la (-20 pts): Fɔli minnu bɛ bɔ sɔrɔyɔrɔw la minnu tɛ se ka da u kan
scoring.accuracyCheck3: Unverifiable Claim (-10 pts): Kuma minnu tɛ se ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ tiɲɛ na
scoring.accuracyCheck4: Misali : Nkalon fɔlen (-40) + Soso min ma sɛgɛsɛgɛ (-20) = Jate laban ye 40 ye
scoring.accuracyCalc: Ko caman bɛ ɲɔgɔn dalajɛ - jalaki kelen-kelen bɛɛ bɛ waleya ɲɔgɔn fɛ
scoring.flagStatusDesc: Kɔnɔkow bɛ taamasiyɛn kɛ u yɛrɛma ka da sɛgɛsɛgɛli jaabiw kan:
scoring.flag1: Dakun ɲuman (Green): Jate minnu bɛ tɛmɛ 80 kan - u labɛnnen don ka bɔ
scoring.flag2: A mago bɛ jateminɛ na (Jɛman): Jate 60-79 - ɲɛtaa misɛnninw ka kan ka kɛ
scoring.flag3: Flagged for Review (Orange): Jate 40-59 - seginnkanni wajibiyalen don sani a ka bɔ
scoring.flag4: Ko gɛlɛnw (Red): Jateden minnu bɛ 40 duguma - aw kana bɔ fo n’u ɲɛnabɔra
scoring.disclosureDesc: Walasa ka fɛnw laseli kɛ, o sitɛmu bɛ nin fana lajɛ:
scoring.disclosure1: Is Promotional: A b’a dɔn ni kɔnɔkow ye piblisite ye walima ni u bɛ dɛmɛ
scoring.disclosure2: Has Disclosure: A bɛ a lajɛ ni #ad, #sponsored, walima partnership disclosure bɛnnen don
scoring.disclosure3: Sigidaw ka sariya labatoli: A bɛ FTC (US), EU ani Norvege ka kunnafonidi sariyaw sɛgɛsɛgɛ
scoring.disclosure4: Kunnafoni minnu ma sɔrɔ, olu bɛ sariya tiɲɛniba (-25 points) lawuli sariya labatoli jate kan
scoring.tip: Jateblaw bɛ jate kokura tuma o tuma ni kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛra. Baara kɛ ni Rewrite fɛɛrɛ ye walasa ka kunnafoni minnu bɛ jate dɔgɔya, olu ɲɛ ka taa a fɛ i yɛrɛma k’a sɔrɔ i bɛ i ka cikan mara.

analyze.intro: Baarakɛcogo min bɛ wele ko Analyse Content, o b’i dɛmɛ ka kɔnɔkow jateminɛ minnu bɛ yen, ni u bɛ sariya labatoli la, ni u bɛ se ka kɛ ni laadalakow ye, ani ni u ka ɲi sani u ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan.
analyze.stepsDesc: Aw ye nin fɛɛrɛ ninnu labato walasa k’aw ka kɔnɔkow sɛgɛsɛgɛ:
analyze.step1: I ka taa Content Intelligence > Analyse Content tab la
analyze.step2: I ka kɔnɔkow nɔrɔ walima k’u sɛbɛn sɛbɛnni yɔrɔ la
analyze.step3: Profil Stratégique dɔ sugandi walasa ka i ka marka laadilikanw sirataama
analyze.step4: I b’a fɛ ka ‘Generate accompanying image’ lajɛ n’i b’a fɛ AI ka yecogo dɔ dilan
analyze.step5: ‘Sɛgɛsɛgɛli’ digi walasa ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli dafalen kɛ
analyze.type1: Laadalata sɛgɛsɛgɛli: A bɛ kunnafoniw sɛgɛsɛgɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni plateforme sariyaw ni sariyakolow ye (FTC, GDPR) .
analyze.type2: Cɛsiricogo: A bɛ fɛnw sɛgɛsɛgɛ minnu bɛ se ka mɔgɔ tɔɔrɔ walima minnu tɛ se ka ladamu
analyze.type3: Tiɲɛni sɛgɛsɛgɛli: A bɛ kuma fɔlenw ni tiɲɛw lajɛ ni u ye tiɲɛ ye
analyze.type4: Brand Alignment: A bɛ kɔnɔkow suma ni i ka Strategic Profile laadilikanw ye
analyze.tip: Baara kɛ ni ‘Sɛbɛnni kokura’ butɔni ye walasa ka kunnafoniw ɲɛ ka ɲɛ i yɛrɛma minnu bɛ jate 70 duguma.AI bɛna koɲɛw ɲɛnabɔ minnu bɛ darapo la k’a sɔrɔ a bɛ i ka cikan mara.

generate.intro: Generate Content baarakɛcogo bɛ baara kɛ ni AI ye walasa ka kunnafoni kuraw dilan ka da i ka barokun kan, i ka plateforme wajibiyalenw kan, ani i ka marka laadilikanw kan.
generate.step1: Aw bɛ taa Kɔnɔkow hakilila > Kɔnɔkow bɔli yɔrɔ la
generate.step2: I ka barokun don walima i b’a fɛ ka min da, i k’o ɲɛfɔ
generate.step3: I ka laɲini plateforme(s) ani sɛbɛnnikan sugandi
generate.step4: Profil Stratégique dɔ sugandi walasa ka marka ka ɲɔgɔn sɔrɔ
generate.step5: ‘Generate’ digi walasa ka kunnafoniw dilan minnu bɛ baara kɛ ni AI ye
generate.optionsDesc: I ka kɔnɔkow labɛnna ka kɛɲɛ ni nin sugandiliw ye:
generate.option1: Plateforme Sugandili: Plateforme kelen walima caman sugandi (LinkedIn, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram)
generate.option2: Sɛbɛnni kɛcogo: A sugandi ka bɔ Professional, Casual, Inspirational walima Informative kɔnɔ
generate.option3: Kɔnɔkow janya: I ka kɔnɔkow janya laɲinilen ladilan
generate.option4: Jaa dilancogo: I ka wuli ka ja dɔ dilan min bɛ taa ni a ye AI fɛ
generate.tip: Kɔnɔkow minnu Dabɔra, olu bɛ Sɛgɛsɛgɛ u yɛrɛma dabɔli kɔfɛ. Aw ye jatew lajɛ ani ka baara kɛ ni jaabi butɔni ye walasa ka u labɛn kokura ni mago bɛ a la.

schedulePrompt.intro: Schedule Prompt b’a to i bɛ se ka kunnafoni dilancogo otomatiki sigi sen kan min bɛ baara kɛ waati latigɛlenw na, k’i ka kɔnɔkow kalandriya falen k’a sɔrɔ i ma bololabaara kɛ.
schedulePrompt.howToDesc: Aw ye ɲininkaliw dabɔ minnu bɛ kɔnɔkow lawuli u yɛrɛma:
schedulePrompt.step1: Aw ye aw ka kɔnɔkow bɔli ɲininkali dabɔ ni barokun ni i diyanyekow ye
schedulePrompt.step2: Aw ye waati bolodacogo sigi sen kan (don o don, dɔgɔkun o dɔgɔkun, walima don kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenw) .
schedulePrompt.step3: Kɔnɔkow ka kan ka bɔ waati min na, o sugandi
schedulePrompt.step4: ‘Auto-analyze’ (Auto-analyze’ (Auto-analyze) (Sɛgɛsɛgɛli) kɛcogo ɲɛ walasa ka sɛgɛsɛgɛli kɛ kɔnɔkow kan minnu dilannen don a yɛrɛma
schedulePrompt.benefitsTitle: Nafa minnu bɛ sɔrɔ Ladilikan bolodalenw na
schedulePrompt.benefit1: Aw bɛ sɛbɛnw bilali cogo basigilen mara k’a sɔrɔ aw ma bololabaara kɛ don o don
schedulePrompt.benefit2: Kɔnɔkow labɔ daɲɛw dilanni waati ɲumanw na
schedulePrompt.benefit3: Aw ye kɔnɔkow kɔfɛta dɔ jɔ walasa ka segin a kan ani ka sɔn a ma
schedulePrompt.tip: Ladilikan minnu bolodara, olu bɛ kɔnɔkow lawuli i ka sɛbɛnw kɔnɔ. Aw bɛ segin a kan ani ka sɔn a ma sani aw ka gafe bɔ walasa ka a jira ko a ka ɲi.

schedulePost.intro: Schedule Post b’a to i bɛ se ka kunnafoni minnu dabɔra, olu bila sira kan walasa u ka bɔli kɛ otomatiki la waati ɲumanw na i ka sosiyete ka kunnafonidilanw kan minnu bɛ ɲɔgɔn kan.
schedulePost.step1: Ka bɔ kɔnɔkow lajɛcogo bɛɛ la, i ka ‘Schedule’ digi sanni ka ‘Publish Now’ digi.
schedulePost.step2: I ka gafe bɔli don ni waati laɲinitaw sugandi
schedulePost.step3: A sugandi i ka kan ka gafe bɔ sosiyete ka plateformes connectés minnu na
schedulePost.step4: Aw ye a dafa ani ka dɔ fara aw ka layidu bolodalen kan
schedulePost.optionsDesc: Aw ye aw ka sɛbɛnw labɛn minnu bolodara:
schedulePost.option1: Waati kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen: I ka gafe bɔ don ni waati tigitigi sugandi
schedulePost.option2: Waati ɲuman: AI ka kunnafoni bila waati ɲumanw fɔ ka da jɛkafɔ kunnafoniw kan
schedulePost.option3: Plateforme caman: I ka kunnafoni kelenw boloda plateforme caman kan siɲɛ kelen
schedulePost.warning: Poste bolodalenw bɛ kɛ ni sosiyete ka kunnafonidilan kelen ye min bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na. Kontew siri ɲɔgɔn na Settings > Social Profiles kɔnɔ.

approval.intro: Approval Workflow bɛ kɔnɔkow jogoɲumanya sabati, a kɛtɔ ka ɲɛmɔgɔw wajibiya ka segin u kan sani u ka bɔ kɛnɛ kan. O nafa ka bon kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la baarakɛjɛkuluw ni izini minnu bɛ sariya kɔnɔ.
approval.processDesc: Kɔnɔkow bɛ taa cogo min na sɔnni baarakɛcogo fɛ:
approval.step1: Dabɔbaa bɛ kɔnɔkow ci ni ‘Submit for Approval’ digilen ye.
approval.step2: Kɔnɔkow bɛ jira ɲɛmɔgɔ ka Sɔn-ni-sɔn gafe kɔnɔ
approval.step3: Kunnafonidila bɛ kɔnɔkow, jatew ani sɛgɛsɛgɛli jaabiw lajɛ
approval.step4: Manager bɛ sɔn, a bɛ fɛn caman Changer, walima a bɛ ban kɔnɔkow la
approval.status1: Draft: Kɔnɔkow bɛ baara la, u ma ci fɔlɔ
approval.status2: Ka sɔnni makɔnɔ: A bilala ani a bɛ makɔnɔni na ka ɲɛmɔgɔ ka seginnkanni kɛ
approval.status3: A sɔnna: A labɛnnen don ka gafe bɔ walima ka waati boloda
approval.status4: Needs Revision: Manager ye fɛn caman ɲini - ka hakilinaw lajɛ ani ka segin ka ci
approval.tip: Aw bɛ sɛbɛnniw fara a kan ni aw bɛ kɔnɔkow ci walasa ka ɲɛfɔli kɛ seginnkannikɛlaw kan aw ka daɲɛw labɛnni latigɛw kan. O bɛ sɔnni kɛcogo teliya.

gdpr.weValuePrivacy: An b’i ka gundolakow nafa bonya
gdpr.cookieDescription: An bɛ baara kɛ ni cookies ye walasa ka i ka navigatiɔn kɛcogo ɲɛ, ka kunnafoniw di i yɛrɛ ma, ani ka an ka taamasiyɛnw sɛgɛsɛgɛ. Ni i ye “Sɔn bɛɛ” digi, i bɛ sɔn an ka baara kɛ ni cookies ye. I bɛ se ka i diyanyekow kɛ ka kɛɲɛ ni i yɛrɛ sago ye walima ka ban cookies minnu tɛ nafama ye.
gdpr.readPrivacyPolicy: An ka kunnafoniw maracogo sariya kalan
gdpr.customizePreferences: Ka kɛɲɛ ni i yɛrɛ sago ye
gdpr.essentialCookiesDesc: A wajibiyalen don dantigɛli, lakana ani baarakɛcogo jɔnjɔnw kama. A tɛ se ka kɛ baarakɛbali ye.
gdpr.analyticsCookiesDesc: An dɛmɛ k’a faamu cogo min na taamakɛlaw bɛ jɛɲɔgɔnya kɛ ni an ka plateforme ye walasa k’an ka baara kɛcogo ɲɛ.
gdpr.marketingCookiesDesc: A bɛ kɛ ka piblisitew lase mɔgɔ yɛrɛ ma ani ka kanpaɲi nafa suman.
